about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey into the depths of darkness with Tiny Dungeons!



Betrayed and left for dead in the treacherous depths of a sprawling dungeon, your only hope lies in the enigmatic hands of 'The Fortune Teller.' Reanimated and armed with nothing but sheer determination, you face a relentless labyrinth, swarming hordes of enemies, and formidable elite bosses. Alone, your chances of survival are slim, but with The Fortune Teller's guidance, you just might stand a chance...




The Tarot's Unpredictable Power: Brace yourself for the ultimate game of chance! Draw from a deck of 78 distinct cards, each with the power to either elevate you to godlike prowess or plunge you into the abyss of defeat. Every dungeon run is an unpredictable rollercoaster of fate, keeping you on the edge of your seat!



Comrades in Arms: Loneliness is your worst enemy in this subterranean nightmare. Recruit loyal companions to fight by your side as you confront increasingly merciless adversaries. But be cautious! Your companions have their own wills and loyalties. Build their trust by battling alongside them, engaging in heartfelt conversations, and showering them with gifts. In time, you may even invite them to your personal sanctuary!

A Home Beneath the Shadows: Create the underground haven of your wildest dreams as you buy, build, and decorate your very own player home. Uncover hidden treasures, conquer secret rooms, defeat enigmatic NPCs, and adorn your abode with unique decorations, each with its own story to tell.

Mysterious Procedural Mini-Dungeons: Venture into the unknown as you stumble upon open hatches, descend dark stairwells, and explore ominous holes in the ground. Traverse randomly generated mini-dungeons that promise unparalleled challenges and exclusive rewards, all shrouded in darkness, awaiting your discovery.

Dare to enter 'The Heart of The Dungeon,' and unlock the secrets of your entrapment, for no one has ever escaped its malevolent grasp. Will you defy fate, embrace the Tarot's capricious power, and emerge victorious? It's a journey where the line between triumph and despair is as thin as the cards you draw. Are you ready to take the plunge into the abyss?

name: Tiny Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-1115G4
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Brace yourself for the ultimate game of chance! Draw from a deck of 78 distinct cards, each with the power to either elevate you to godlike prowess or plunge you into the abyss of defeat. Every dungeon run is an unpredictable rollercoaster of fate... can you escape the unescapable dungeon?
